document_title: Breast cancer: Signs, causes and prevention
subsection_content:
If you have these symptoms, you should see a doctor immediately for timely examination and diagnosis:
Lumps appear in the breast, near the breast or under the armpit;; Fluid from the nipple, especially bloody fluid;; Breast dimpling or thickening of the breast skin;; Soreness in the breast or nipple area;; Signs of nipple inversion;; Breasts change in size and shape;; The skin of the breast, areola or nipple is scaly, red or swollen;; Indentations in the skin of the breast that resemble the skin of an orange are called cellulite.
subsection_title: ung thu vu.json. 8 Signs of breast cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu vu.json. 8 Signs of breast cancer
If you have these symptoms, you should see a doctor immediately for timely examination and diagnosis:
Lumps appear in the breast, near the breast or under the armpit;; Fluid from the nipple, especially bloody fluid;; Breast dimpling or thickening of the breast skin;; Soreness in the breast or nipple area;; Signs of nipple inversion;; Breasts change in size and shape;; The skin of the breast, areola or nipple is scaly, red or swollen;; Indentations in the skin of the breast that resemble the skin of an orange are called cellulite.
